title: Sometimes the updated community requirements are not being updated in mobile UI until user opens new invite to this community

milestone.title: 1.27.0 - Alpha
milestone.description:
### This release *might* be the release that becomes Status Mobile's first public alpha

Mobile dev team priorities In priority order:

**1. Finish anything that wasn't completed in the previous 1.26 cycle**

**2. Fix bugs, both functional and UX fit-and-finish defects.**  

- specifically focus on bugs related to the Communities functionality, when a community is utilizing all the community admin functionality available in Status Desktop

- any remaining UX quality defects

**3. Complete building any Communities functionality that's in the MVP Communities designs and not yet built**  

**4. Work on any outstanding ad-hoc group chat functionality as per the MVP spec**  

- Test with Status Desktop to ensure mobile and desktop interop in all aspects of ad-hoc group chat functionality.


**--- Things that should NOT be worked on this cycle ---**

- We shouldn't start anything in Settings or Profile related, with the exception of Wallet setting that the Mobile Wallet team may work on.

body:
Followup of https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/17799 cc @ilmotta 

Issue is not reproducible every time. Sometimes it works, sometimes not. 

**Steps:** 

1. Desktop user creates non token gated (with no permissons)
2. Desktop user send invite to Mobile user
3. Mobile user opens community invite card
4. Desktop user changes non token gated community to token gated by setting  X permissions (for example 1 SNT to become a member)
5. See if community permissions are updated for Mobile user community UI

**Actual result:** permissions are not updated for Mobile user community UI. "Request to join" button is still active, user is able to send request although will not join the community if does not meet the requirements. The requirements are updated after Desktop user sends new invite and Mobile user follows this new invite. 

**Expected result:** community requirements should be updated once they are updated by community admin.  

### Additional Information

- Status version: nightly 
- Operating System: Android, iOS


[comment]: # (Please, add logs/notes if necessary)
